<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Dupe's Gold Nugget](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1582)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a ranged weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You hit with a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon

**Requirement** You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
</row>

</column>

---

This nugget of gold and lead amalgam is attached to the weapon by thick, twisted wire or chain. When activated, the target's limbs become like lead weights. For 2 rounds, each time the target Strides it must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save. On a failure, it takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed for that Stride (to a minimum Speed of 5 feet). On a critical success, the dupe's gold nugget effect ends early.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dupe's Gold Nugget
requirement: You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
